      protected static final String[] FIELDS

    • create

      public static AbstractPageLoader create(StructElement topStructElement) throws IndexUnreachableException, PresentationException, DAOException
      Creates and returns the appropriate loader instance for the given StructElement. Only creates loaders that load pages.
      Parameters:
      topStructElement - Top level StructElement of the record
      Returns:
      Appropriate page loader implementation for the given record topStructElement
      Throws:
      IndexUnreachableException
      DAOException
      PresentationException

    • create

      public static AbstractPageLoader create(StructElement topStructElement, boolean loadPages) throws IndexUnreachableException, PresentationException, DAOException
      Creates and returns the appropriate loader instance for the given StructElement.
      Parameters:
      topStructElement - Top level StructElement of the record
      loadPages - If true, created an appropriate page loader; if false (e.g. for TOC building), create a dummy loader
      Returns:
      Appropriate page loader implementation for the given record topStructElement
      Throws:
      IndexUnreachableException
      DAOException
      PresentationException

      Parameters:
      topStructElement -
      pageNosToLoad - List of page numbers to load; empty list means all pages
      Returns:

    • buildPageLabelTemplate

      protected String buildPageLabelTemplate(String format, Locale locale) throws IndexUnreachableException
      Replaces the static variable placeholders (the ones that don't change depending on the page) of the given label format with values.

      locale - a Locale object.
      Returns:
      a String object.

      loadPageFromDoc.

      Parameters:

      pi - Record identifier
      topElement - StructElement of the top record element
      pageOwnerIddocMap - Optional map containing relationships between pages and owner IDDOCs
